name: AP_CLAIM_IF_INIT_MCC_FLAG
description: Indicates if the diagnosis was a complication or comorbidity (CC) or major complication or comorbidity (MCC) for initial Diagnosis Related Grouper (DRG) assignment.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: DX_INITIAL_CC_OR_MCC_FLAG
columns.description: Indicates if the diagnosis was a Complication/Comorbidity or Major Complication/Comorbidity for initial Diagnosis-Related group (DRG) assignment.
